content: the oceana ice cream pint cozy works up quickly and is great for markets or little gifts this pattern has been tested for accuracy but please contact me at craftsbysarahliz@gmail com if you encounter any issues i would love to see your cozies tag me on instagram @craftsbysarahliz so i can see your work thank you for your interest in my pattern your support of my small business is truly appreciated permissions you are free to sell what you make from this pattern i would appreciate links back to my blog ravelry or etsy shop to credit me as the designer you may not use my photos you may not sell this pattern or any part of this pattern distribute it or claim it as your own © 2023 sarah gross - crafts by sarah liz
